channel.title: Can someone help? have a few issues
channel.description: 1. Is it because im using Mopar client that everything seems old? If so what is a good client to use with Allstarscape source? 2. While on allstar scape and I try and trade a shop keeper it just freezes, no idea on this one. 3. How do I know if I can use a client or not? hearn about it being open or closed? :confused: :confused: :confused: I believe that is all for now, thanks guys.

item.title: Can someone help? have a few issues
item.dc:creator: @klomp3 klomp3
item.description:
@klomp3 wrote:

silab isn’t shit, its one of the only clients without a single null in it,
it only isn’t smart to use it for delta or server’s with customs.

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone help? have a few issues
item.dc:creator: @klomp3 klomp3
item.description:
@klomp3 wrote:

[quote=“dank k0, post:1, topic:259801”]1. Is it because im using Mopar client that everything seems old? If so what is a good client to use with Allstarscape source?
2. While on allstar scape and I try and trade a shop keeper it just freezes, no idea on this one.
3. How do I know if I can use a client or not? hearn about it being open or closed?

I believe that is all for now, thanks guys.[/quote]

  1. As xjadefighter said, silabsoft is a good opinion
  2. One of the shops in allstar is glitched if im right so it could be that.
  3. You Should take a client with as few as possible null’s, silabclient has no nulls. Unless you want to have customs.

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone help? have a few issues
item.dc:creator: @xjadefighter xjadefighter
item.description:
@xjadefighter wrote:

[quote=“dank k0, post:3, topic:259801”][quote author=xjadefighter link=topic=343064.msg2650640#msg2650640 date=1233510038]

  1. Is it because im using Mopar client that everything seems old? If so what is a good client to use with Allstarscape source?
  2. While on allstar scape and I try and trade a shop keeper it just freezes, no idea on this one.
  3. How do I know if I can use a client or not? hearn about it being open or closed?

    I believe that is all for now, thanks guys.
  1. Ya moparscape client is a old client so is silab client. And a good client to use with it is im not really sure look on the downloads section.
  2. It freezes probly because the items have silab items and moparscape client dosen’t support them.
  3. If a client is closed it only gose to 1 server. if a client is open you can change the ip to anything.
    [/quote]

Thanks so much. So any open client works? and what is testscape and allstarscape 317? or what[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2009, 12:01:23 pm[/size][hr]Also when I change my skill levels in the character files, they are not what i entered? like when i enter 99 for something i come out with 97 or 98, should i put 100 to counter the affect or?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2009, 12:08:43 pm[/size][hr]Sorry, another thing is that there is a ton of nulled items on my server, like sometimes whole shops are null, im using allstar scape, might change to testscape, is this because of the client im using? also is there a way to clean sweep all npcs and created items on the server? thank you again :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2009, 12:09:57 pm[/size][hr]Another thing about the 99 skills, its because its making them 99 out of 1 like 99 / 1 how do i change the base skill? i feel like a baby needing spoon fed :X[/quote]

The null thing is that those items have deffernt ids in the client that ur useing and for the skills just make ur self owner and do ::master

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help? have a few issues

  3. How do I know if I can use a client or not? hearn about it being open or closed?

    I believe that is all for now, thanks guys.
    [/quote]
  1. Ya moparscape client is a old client so is silab client. And a good client to use with it is im not really sure look on the downloads section.
  2. It freezes probly because the items have silab items and moparscape client dosen’t support them.
  3. If a client is closed it only gose to 1 server. if a client is open you can change the ip to anything.[/quote]

Thanks so much. So any open client works? and what is testscape and allstarscape 317? or what[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2009, 12:01:23 pm[/size][hr]Also when I change my skill levels in the character files, they are not what i entered? like when i enter 99 for something i come out with 97 or 98, should i put 100 to counter the affect or?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2009, 12:08:43 pm[/size][hr]Sorry, another thing is that there is a ton of nulled items on my server, like sometimes whole shops are null, im using allstar scape, might change to testscape, is this because of the client im using? also is there a way to clean sweep all npcs and created items on the server? thank you again :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2009, 12:09:57 pm[/size][hr]Another thing about the 99 skills, its because its making them 99 out of 1 like 99 / 1 how do i change the base skill? i feel like a baby needing spoon fed :X
